extendedInfo.description: It's too late to protect your phone after the phone missing. Protect your phone now with XtraSEC Mobile Security. XtraSEC Mobile Security is a free Android security suite that helps user to protect their phone being stolen. XtraSEC provides some cutting edge and unique features to increase the chances for user to find back the lost phone and also prevent lost phone data leaked to 3rd party.Note: If you have trouble uninstalling, go to Settings -> Location & Security -> Select Device Administrators and uncheck XtraSEC.Features:â Find My Phone(with auto turn on GPS)â Phone alert (make your phone scream!)â Remotely SPY capture photo (NEW!)â SPY Auto capture on invalid lockscreen password enteredâ Detect SIM replacementâ Remotely turn on WiFi or 3G data using SMSâ Remotely check battery infoâ Remotely check telephony infoâ Remotely phone lock with PINâ Remotely phone and SD data wipeâ Wipe proof (XtraSEC survive on factory restore)------------------------------------More details:* Find My Phone  Get you phone location and displayed in Google Maps.  GPS will turn on automatically when needed. (System App required)* Phone Alert (Make Your Phone Scream!)  Misplaced your phone inside your house somewhere? XtraSEC can make your phone scream at loudest possible even phone in silent mode! (Warning: Don't do this during meeting!)* Remotely capture photo (NEW!)  Remotely capture photo from your phone camera.  You can choose either use front or back camera. Back camera will use if front camera doesn't exist.  If using SMS method, captured photo will send out by Email.* Auto capture on invalid lockscreen password entered  If invalid lockscreen password entered, XtraSEC will auto capture using front camera and send out captured photo to owner Email.  This feature is for user using lockscreen pin, password or gesture.* Remotely turn on/off Mobile data(3G)  Remotely turn on/off Mobile data 3G by sending an SMS to your phone using XtraSEC command.* Remotely turn on/off WiFi  Remotely turn on/off WiFi by sending an SMS to your phone using XtraSEC command.* Detect sim replacement  XtraSEC will send out an notification SMS when another SIM card is inserted into your phone.  If you have multiple SIM, please add all of them to sim whitelist.* Remotely phone lock with PIN  Protect your misplaced phone by remotely locking it with a PIN code requirement. Without the correct PIN code, no one can access or use your device.  If someone try to break in the phone, XtraSEC will auto capture using front camera and send out captured photo to owner Email.* Remotely phone and SD data wipe  No luck in retrieving your lost or stolen phone?  Wipe it remotely using XtraSEC Mobile Security. Your phone may be in the wrong hands, but at least your personal information is not.  With option to wipe phone only or wipe entire phone including SD card.  Wipe proof, XtraSEC SMS commands still working even after phone wiped. (System app required)* Remotely check battery info  Check your phone's battery information remotely!  Use this feature to determine how much juice is left in your device while you tracking.* Remotely check telephony info  Retrieve your phone's SIM card information remotely, including whether or not a new SIM card has been inserted.  Useful information for a police report!------------------------------------* Detect SIM Replacement is only for GSM phone.* XtraSEC Mobile Security is a phone security application.  Therefore, anonymous uninstallment is prevented. To uninstall, you must first disable the service, then proceed with an application uninstall as usual.SEO: lookout, phonelocator, phone locator, wheres my droid, mobile locator, mobile phone locator, norton, netqin, webroot, avg, Bitdefender, McAfee, eset, Kaspersky, avast, Anti-Theft, avira, Cerberus, NQ Mobile

reviews.title: Super
reviews.comment: Gud app
reviews.author: suresh p

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: My S2 was stolen and it doesn\'t have any security apps installed. Now i bought an S3 and installed XtraSec. Done a little test to see if the claims do work. And it did. Superb app. Thanks guys. I\'ll donate when i go back to my home country.
reviews.author: Ian Robert Acedilla

reviews.title: Hmmmm...
reviews.comment: I have a sony ion latest tech. Pretty sure all updated.. an sent a sms to try ouy features.. NOTHING HAPPENED. put command altogther an just sent a reg. Text to my phone...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent app if features worked
reviews.comment: Upgraded to paid version and got some of the features. GPS and remote picture taking work but can\'t get the alert on demand to work. I only get a notice stating the phone has been found with no sound. I tried adjusting phone settings and no success. This would be a great feature for locating my phone when buried under laundry, etc. Left message twice with provider with no reply. Please fix.
reviews.author: Kee Guy

reviews.title: One problem
reviews.comment: Whenever it takes a photo on an incorrect lock screen entry it shows a text that says \342\200\234XtraSEC auto capture activated.\" We should be given an option to turn off that text.
reviews.author: Andrew Andros

reviews.title: Very clever
reviews.comment: Works very well. Am rather impressed.
reviews.author: gavin aitchison

reviews.title: Works OK, but impossible to uninstall
reviews.comment: SMS commands mostly work (except front camera on LG-P970). But I could not uninstall, although I tried all procedures (disable admin permission, disable service). Finally used Root App Delete to uninstall.
reviews.author: Michael Hentschel

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: After 5 days of searching, i think this is the only app that enable mobile data access via sms. Also its f**king too simple man...!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Best app but it\'s not accurate when locating even when the gps is on my phone is located over 1 km wrongly and it should have a feature to hide the app from appdrawer other than that 5 stars..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works perfectly on a rooted phone
reviews.comment: With HTC Hero rooted, this worked without issues. The following were tested turning ON 3G using SMS commands,  turning OFF 3g using SMS commands, inserted different sim card and it sent an sms to the saved alternate number. Helps a lot for tracking.. I need to try out on a non-rooted phone  Thanks.. Basappa
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Changed Review
reviews.comment: Originally thought I had a problem with gmail permissions in the app.   Eventually it turned out to be a problem in Gmail. The developer was quick to respond and try to find out the problem.   I recommend the app and the developer.  The only problem is the SMS controls don\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update ui
reviews.comment: Phone locked from web then i turn siren sounds on when tried to unlock phone msg. Dialog pops up saying found phone? When you press okay phone goes to home screen and your in! Plz fix, thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Go Locker/Launcher Impossible; however, the BEST anti-theft app ever!
reviews.comment: I love this app! Better have it than never on any Android phone! I love its auto capture feature when the phone lock was entered incorrectly.. But I hope it would also work for the Go Locker/Launcher app when password is enabled.. Auto capture only takes effect on the system lock.. Please improve.. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Put this app on my RAZR Maxx HD. Worked flawlessly!!  Located my phone dead on and I was even able to capture images using the front and rear cameras. I would highly recommend the web app. It\'s cheap and well worth it when time is of the essence when trying to recover your phone.
reviews.author: mac davis

reviews.comment: Bei mir tut es alles wie beschrieben,es macht spy foto und sendet an gmail, sms comand locate und alert perfect, genau das was ich brauche auf dem Galaxy S3, f\303\274nf sternen verdient.
reviews.author: Milorad Mirkovic

reviews.title: Awsome app!
reviews.comment: Best phone locator on the Market! For best results Root your phone. Only $3 a year to subscribe too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not sure this works!
reviews.comment: I have just tested the gps function and its over 3000 meters out! There are a lot of people in 3000 meters - am I doing something wrong? I\'ve logged out and in several times and I\'ve refreshed the gps locater ... it takes me to another house - and there are many houses and people between where the phone is and where xtrasec claims that the phone is ... any tips?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says it will do
reviews.comment: Very good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3 can\'t send text
reviews.comment: After installing this I couldn\'t send text messages anymore though I could still receive... strange....
reviews.author: Van Tsai

reviews.title: Not accurate
reviews.comment: Needs better accuracy when locating phone, didn\'t turn on GPS when locating. But other than that. Really good app. Highly recommend
reviews.author: A Google User
